page.title: 11Churchgate St Old Inn
page.content:
The{Queen's Head}is a grade 2 listed building in a conservation area. The inn stocks 12 different beers, 20 spirits and 10 wines. Lager is the most popular drink.
The demand for meals and snacks is increasing. Friday replaces Saturday as the busiest evening, with over 300 customers. The{publican}says that people are now tending to eat out on a Saturday evening instead of visiting their local.
The inn's customers are mostly young working men. Women customers,mainly in their twenties, are on the increase, particularly at lunch time.
Famous customers include{Lionel Bart,} writer of the musical "Oliver!" and{ {Clive Jenkins,}Union leader.
